text: Ștefan Pongratz (born 17 August 1930) is a Romanian rower. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's eight where they were eliminated in the round one repêchage. ==References== == External links == * Category:1930 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Romanian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Romania Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Sportspeople from Arad Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Ștefan Pongratz
